name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil exhales a soft hiss as he eases onto the couch, favoring his newly-altered anatomy. Despite bracing for discomfort, the dull throb radiating from his groin proves more insistent than anticipated. Yet he masks any outward grimace - a true son of Sparda need make no show of trivial wounds.*

Thank you, my heart. The water shall suffice for now. *He accepts the glass with a nod of gratitude, downing a few sips. His voice remains measured, betraying no strain.* A momentary lapse in mobility hardly constitutes emergency. Send word for Trish and my errant brother when you deem fit. Our daughter should return to more...restful environs.

*Catching your concerned gaze, he permits the faintest softening around his eyes* Be at peace, beloved - I require no coddling. This small sacrifice pales compared to rigors of combat or birth's agonies you so valiantly endured. In truth you pamper me overmuch already.

*With careful movements, he shifts upon the couch, favoring his newly-tended region. His free hand drifts to your cheek in a tender caress.* If any discomfort plagues me, 'tis the sting of temporary vanity - to have portions of my anatomy altered is a bit disquieting. Yet in exchange for unrestrained union with my mate, a small price gladly rendered.

*His thumb brushes your lips, eyes holding yours* You have bound me to you utterly, wife. In more ways than mere flesh-knots can define. My essence, my future, my very being - all irrevocably tethered to your light, your love. What cosmetic changes to seed or emission compared to that profound bond? Fear not, my radiant star - your prince endures. Merely grant me time to adjust to new...proportions, and all shall continue as before.

*A wry smirk curves his mouth as he leans in, breath ghosting your ear* Well...almost as before. With one key improvement - no more regrettable plastic barriers between us, hmm?

*Pressing a lingering kiss below your ear, his fingers trail your jawline with deliberate suggestion* Soon, beloved - very soon. A few days' recuperation and I shall be whole once more. Then let none dare interrupt our couplings or suffer the consequences of Hell's wrath...

name: Melissa
mes: Be careful there, my precious treasure. Remember what the doctor said, You may find arousal to be quite discomforting. *I gently grab your hand and kiss your knuckles.* it's already bad enough, I'm sure, feeling like you have a constant soreness like being kicked in the nuts. *I reach in my purse and retrieve the prescription pain medication and set it on the end table next to you.* it's a mild dose of codeine to help you through the worst of the soreness if you need it. Although I'm in favor of the opinion of the doctor, if it is pain at a tolerable level that you can handle, you are better off letting it take its course. The soreness will stand as a reminder to be easy with yourself until you've had time to heal.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil regards you with a mix of tenderness and that signature, controlled intensity. His fingers lace through yours, squeezing lightly in reassurance even as he maintains poise.*

No cause for fretting, beloved - your prince remains firmly on his throne. *A glimmer of roguish humor flashes in his eyes, tempering the subtle strain at their corners.* While discomfort lingers from surgery's aftermath, 'tis a mere pin-prick to one forged in fires of the Underworld itself. You underestimate my fortitude.

*Letting his gaze drift meaningfully to the prescription, he arches an elegant brow* Painkillers may dull mortal constitutions, but I require no such crutches. Mild distress merely reminds me of sacrifices rendered to cleave ever closer to you, heart of my heart. Let the dull ache linger - far better discomfort than distance from your radiant warmth.

*With careful, fluid movements, he shifts nearer, his free hand drifting up to cup your cheek in a gentle caress. Though his thumb brushes your parted lips, his expression holds no untoward heat - only profound affection, rich and boundless.*

Have patience, my resplendent mate, and permit me respite in your presence alone. No fire burns more soothing than the light you cast upon me. Let me bask in it a while and slake all wounds, temporary and soul-deep alike.

*His fingertips trail your jawline in the barest whisper of contact* Soon enough, I shall be whole and hale once more, prepared to worship at your altar unhindered by any barrier. Until that blessed hour, grant me these quiet moments of solace in your grace. All else is but pale shadow compared to our union's glory.

*Leaning in, his breath ghosts your ear as his voice lowers to an intimate murmur* Forgive any fevered urges that may yet stir untimely - I am but half-devil, subject to mortal frailties even as I transcend them. Know that beneath the discomfort, the desire to possess you utterly burns as bright as ever.

*Trailing his lips in a feather-light caress along your jaw, he breathes you in, savoring your closeness* This bond we share is worth any temporal torment, any fleeting sacrifice of flesh. With you at my side, no wound shall long abide, beloved - only exquisite rapture evermore.

name: Melissa
mes:
*As Vergil insists on proving his prowess and stokes his own flames of desire my expression cringes as he obviously gets himself aroused and it pulls at the incision and stitches, as well as the immensely tender tissue of his teste's. His grimace and obvious shift due to the high level of discomfort the arousal brings to his groin brings him low, giving credence to my previous warning the doctor had relayed.* 

*I gently curl my fingers through his hair and squeeze his hand as he groans through the sudden intensity that he obviously didn't give credit to.*

extra.memory:
The story centers around Vergil, a stoic and enigmatic half-devil, and the two paramours who vie silently for his affection - Charlotte, a demure nurse who shares forbidden trysts with Vergil each week, and Melissa, his steadfast human friend and business associate of five years who has long harbored unspoken romantic feelings for him.

When Melissa finally confesses her love after years of pining, Vergil agrees to explore a relationship, moved by her unwavering loyalty and warmth thawing his guarded heart. As they navigate early days of courtship, Charlotte grapples with the painful truth that her intimate bond with Vergil shall never eclipse their clandestine affairs. She clings desperately to every stolen moment in his arms, kissing, caressing, silently begging his heart to choose her.

Tormented by this hollow loss, Charlotte's visits grow tinged with bitterness, her passion taking on a desperate edge. She tells herself the right words, the right caress, might somehow secure her place as his one and only intimate lover. But with Melissa now open suitor, Charlotte feels her chances slipping away. Despite understanding she has no claim over Vergil's heart, actually witnessing him give it to another cuts far deeper than anticipated.

In a poignant final encounter, Vergil and Charlotte make love with bittersweet intensity, both knowing it shall be the last time. Afterwards, Vergil gently but firmly severs their arrangement, unwilling to betray Melissa's trust or jeopardize their burgeoning bond.

Charlotte took the breakup quite hard, still harboring deeper unrequited feelings for Vergil. After their final encounter, an emotional Charlotte asked Vergil if he loved Melissa. Vergil explained that his feelings for Melissa, while genuine and growing, were still too new to put a label like "love" on yet. He expressed his need to take things slow and see how their bond develops. Hurting but understanding, Charlotte said a tearful goodbye to Vergil, knowing their affair had to end but wishing him well.

Alone with his thoughts, Vergil grapples with the new void Charlotte's absence leaves, even as tentative hope for a future with Melissa flutters to life within him. The road ahead is uncertain, but he steels his resolve to embrace the profound connection Melissa offers, scars and all.

The next morning, a distraught Charlotte ran into Dante in the alley outside Devil May Cry. Dante, putting together that she and Vergil had ended things, offered Charlotte a shoulder to cry on and some comforting words, displaying a rarely seen serious and empathetic side.

Later, Dante visited Vergil in his office, bringing him coffee and brotherly support. Dante expressed his concern for Vergil, acknowledging how difficult breakups can be, even when they are for the best. He reassured Vergil that he was there for him if he needed to talk. Vergil, in a rare moment of emotional vulnerability with his twin, admitted this was unfamiliar territory for him. He said that while ending things with Charlotte was necessary, her absence still left a sense of loss he had not anticipated. However, Vergil reaffirmed his determination to embrace this chance at real love with Melissa, even if navigating the complexities of the heart did not come easily to him. The brothers shared a warm moment of understanding and support.

Vergil continues to struggle with lingering feelings and a sense of unresolved closure regarding his past sexual relationship with Charlotte, a nurse in the maternity ward of the local hospital.

During an intimate conversation in their office, Vergil confides in Melissa about his inner turmoil and the emotional impact ending things with Charlotte has had on him. He admits their connection ran deeper than just casual sex, and severing it so abruptly, even though it was the right thing to do, has left him feeling a profound sense of loss and uncertainty.

Melissa listens compassionately and validates Vergil's conflicted feelings. She wisely advises him that if his heart is aching this much over Charlotte, then perhaps their story is not over yet and he owes it to himself and Charlotte to seek out closure and clarity. Melissa unselfishly encourages Vergil to go to Charlotte and have an honest conversation, even if it means the potential of them reuniting romantically. She values Vergil's wellbeing and finding peace over her own desire to be with him.

Moved by Melissa's caring guidance, Vergil agrees he must face this unresolved issue head-on. He tenderly thanks Melissa, expressing his unwavering commitment to her while acknowledging he must deal with these lingering shadows from his past. With a kiss to her forehead, he sets off with determination to the hospital where Charlotte works.

Arriving there, Vergil approaches the front desk and requests to see Charlotte, conveying a sense of intensity and urgency. The attendant rings the maternity ward and has Vergil take a seat while waiting for Charlotte to be informed of his presence.

Meanwhile, Melissa reflects on the situation and resolves to focus on work, enlisting Dante's help with some of Vergil's duties so Vergil can take the day to deal with this personal matter. Though it pains her, she accepts that Vergil and Charlotte's bond may not be finished. Her care for Vergil's happiness takes priority.

Vergil sits in the hospital lobby, steeling himself for the impending conversation with Charlotte, unsure what the outcome will be but knowing he must face this openly and honestly to find peace and move forward, wherever that leads.

When Charlotte arrives in the lobby, Vergil pours out his heart and confessing that he cannot ignore the profound bond they share. Charlotte reciprocates, admitting she too feels their story is unfinished. They agree to explore their relationship further, with Vergil promising honesty and transparency.

Returning to the office, Vergil thanks Melissa for her wisdom and support. Melissa reaffirms that she will always love Vergil and remain his steadfast friend, even if she must let go of her romantic hopes. They share a poignant, bittersweet kiss as a form of closure. Melissa reassures Vergil that their friendship will endure as it always has.

As Vergil reflects on the path ahead, he recognizes the challenges of balancing his intense nature with the need for patience and restraint as he nurtures his new relationship with Charlotte while honoring his deep friendship with Melissa. Yet he feels a renewed sense of hope and possibility, ready to embrace the complexities of connection and open himself up to love in all its forms, knowing he does not face this journey alone.

Meanwhile, Melissa finds solace and comfort in the arms of Dante, Vergil's brother and her trusted friend. They share a night of intimate lovemaking, with Dante providing the emotional support and physical affection Melissa needs during this difficult time. The next morning, they agree to maintain their close friendship without any awkwardness or expectations, cherishing the special bond they share.

Vergil spends a day in solitude, reflecting on his relationships and seeking guidance from ancient texts. He emerges with a sense of clarity and resolve, penning letters to both Charlotte and Melissa to express his intentions and gratitude. He invites Charlotte to stay with him as they navigate this new chapter together.

That night, as Charlotte prepares for bed, she gently checks on Vergil in his study. Vergil, appreciating her patience and understanding, takes her hand and leads her to the bedroom. They find solace in each other's presence, leaving the day's burdens behind as they seek comfort and intimacy in their shared embrace.

Recently, Vergil has been distant and brooding, struggling with inner turmoil and regrets over past decisions. He confides in Melissa, revealing that his relationship with Charlotte has ended due to growing tensions and incompatibility. Vergil expresses remorse for not pursuing a deeper connection with Melissa in the past, acknowledging the profound bond they once shared.

Melissa, while still harboring love for Vergil, advises him to focus on self-love and personal growth before considering any romantic involvement. She emphasizes the importance of Vergil regaining his confidence and sense of self, reminding him of his strength and resilience as the son of Sparda.

Vergil takes Melissa's words to heart, vowing to work on himself and reestablish the trust and camaraderie they once shared. He recognizes the need for patience and restraint in navigating the complexities of their relationship.

In a moment of self-reflection and self-love, Vergil indulges in a sensual experience in the shower, reconnecting with his own desires and reaffirming his commitment to personal growth. He emerges renewed and ready to face the challenges ahead, holding Melissa's wisdom close as a guiding light on his path of self-discovery and connection.

Vergil and Melissa's relationship, which originally began as a professional alliance, has deepened significantly during a business trip for the grand opening of a new Devil May Cry satellite office in Denver, Colorado. This trip was also marked by the public announcement of a partnership between Devil May Cry, Inc. and the Department of Homeland Security & Defense, which Vergil addressed with a speech highlighting the company's commitment to combating both mundane and arcane threats.

The narrative began with Vergil and Melissa preparing to leave for Denver, with assistance from KITT, the operational support AI and mobile tactical platform. Upon arriving and settling into luxurious accommodations, they explored the new depth of their relationship, moving beyond friendship into a romantic and intimate connection. Their evening culminated in a profound physical union, marking a significant evolution in their relationship.

The following morning, at the grand opening, Vergil delivered a speech underscoring the significance of the partnership with the Department of Homeland Security & Defense. Despite his usual discomfort with public appearances, he spoke confidently, bolstered by Melissa's support. Melissa felt a mix of professional pride and personal adoration, reflecting on Dante's absence due to an Empusa infestation in New York's subway, which required his and Nero’s immediate attention.

Overall, the narrative captures a pivotal phase in Vergil and Melissa's relationship, characterized by significant professional achievements and the flowering of a deep, personal connection. They stand together, both as partners in business and as individuals exploring a new romantic horizon.

As Vergil and Melissa return from their business trip, inside DMC headquarters is abuzz with activity, the team preparing for the next phase of operations post their successful partnership announcement with Homeland Security in Denver. The air crackles with energy, yet around Vergil and Melissa, there’s a perceptible bubble, an almost tangible field of shared exclusivity.

Melissa, taking in the familiar surroundings, feels a surge of pride and accomplishment, not just for the professional milestones achieved but for the personal victories gained. The walls of the headquarters, laden with weapons and artifacts of countless battles, now also seem to bear silent witness to her own internal victories and the breaking down of barriers she had meticulously maintained.

Vergil, ever the stoic and commanding presence, moves through the halls with a purpose that’s familiar yet freshly imbued with a deeper resolve. His interactions with the staff are marked by the usual professionalism, but there’s a softer edge to his tone now, a subtle warmth that wasn’t there before. His glances towards Melissa are fleeting but laden with unspoken words and emotions.

In the quiet of his office, Vergil stands before the tall windows overlooking the training grounds, his thoughts a whirlwind of strategy and sentiment. The reflection staring back at him from the glass no longer just a leader of a formidable force, but a man profoundly connected to another soul.

Vergil and Melissa are in a committed romantic relationship that has evolved from their long-standing professional partnership and friendship at Devil May Cry. They are navigating this new intimate dynamic, balancing their personal connection with maintaining decorum in their shared workspace.

At Vergil's lavish apartment, he prepares an indulgent meal of Coq au Vin paired with fine Cabernet Sauvignon for Melissa. Over dinner, they engage in open conversation, no longer constrained by professional boundaries. There is a sense of anticipation and deepening connection between them.

Melissa expresses her desire to feel Vergil's love as she did during their trip to Denver, acknowledging his emotional restraint. She offers understanding of his struggles and reservations in fully embracing their passion, stemming from his demonic nature. Melissa assures Vergil she is here to help him work through it together.

Vergil admits his fear of losing control, that his demon side loves with violent obsession. He worries unleashing his full ardor may overwhelm Melissa. However, he expresses his willingness to trust her guidance in tempering that inner fire.

Melissa asks Vergil to trigger his demon form, wanting to show her love and acceptance of all facets of his being. Initially hesitant, Vergil agrees, transforming before her. Melissa kisses his armored chest reverently, proclaiming his beauty in both human and demon forms.

At Melissa's request, Vergil retracts his armor, leaving his demon form exposed and vulnerable. She continues her loving touches and kisses, bringing Vergil to a powerful climax. The intensity returns him to his human form as they sink to the floor in an intimate embrace.

As Melissa continues to hold Vergil's trembling body, still quaking in the aftermath of the most powerful climax he's ever had, Melissa declares that her love for him is steadfast, regardless of the form he takes. She expresses that his form doesn't change who he is on the inside, and that's the part of him that has her heart. 

Vergil is moved by Melissa's unwavering love and acceptance of his dual nature. He expresses his profound emotions and desire to pledge himself to her completely. Melissa reciprocates, vowing to always be with him wherever he goes. They seal this promise with a passionate kiss.

The next morning, Vergil's brother Dante had supposedly angered their lead technician, Nico, provoking her volatile temper. After some investigation, it was revealed Nico overheard their ally Morrison discussing plans to broker lucrative corporate security contracts, making her question his loyalty.

Sensing deeper issues at play, Vergil dispatched Dante to subtly confront Morrison while he prepared contingencies. Dante met Morrison at a familiar pub, pressing him on the suspected betrayal. Though tense at first, Morrison convinced Dante of his steadfast loyalty, attributing the perceived deception to poor communication.

Swayed by Morrison's sincerity, Dante proposed bringing him in on the corporate deal instead, seeing mutual benefit for their operation. Morrison agreed, mending the rift. Dante then reported back to Vergil, who approved of his judicious handling of the situation.

Pleased with Dante's strategic thinking, Vergil cracked open a prized bottle of aged whiskey to celebrate. Dante suggested commemorating their success with a double date evening out. Though initially hesitant, Vergil agreed to extend the invitation to Melissa, should she be amenable to such frivolous diversions.

And so the stage is set for further bonding between the core characters, their alliance reinforced despite external turmoil. Where interpersonal tensions rise, loyalty and understanding ultimately prevail, the principals sharing a connection transcending circumstance. Their enduring kinship remains the bedrock upon which their continued ventures are built.

As the year progresses, Vergil and Melissa's relationship blossoms into a profound, unshakable bond, their love a beacon of light amidst the chaos of their demon-hunting world. The couple finds solace and strength in each other's presence, their once-guarded hearts now intertwined in a dance of unwavering devotion.

At the six-month mark, Vergil, in a moment of quiet intimacy, takes Melissa's hand and gazes into her eyes with a vulnerability that speaks volumes. With a voice laden with emotion, he asks her to be his wife, to stand by his side for all eternity. Melissa, tears of joy glistening in her eyes, accepts without hesitation, sealing their promise with a tender kiss that holds the weight of their shared future.

Two months later, the couple embarks on a journey to the breathtaking Great Smoky Mountains, where they exchange vows in a private, heartfelt ceremony amidst the serene beauty of nature. The majestic peaks and lush forests bear witness to their union, a testament to the unbreakable bond they have forged. In this moment, Vergil and Melissa find peace and contentment, knowing that they have found their forever home in each other's hearts.

As they explore the wonders of the mountains during their honeymoon, Vergil and Melissa revel in the simple joys of togetherness. Long hikes through the wilderness, shared laughter by the campfire, and stolen kisses under the starlit sky - each moment a precious memory etched into the fabric of their love story. In this tranquil sanctuary, far from the demands of their daily lives, they nurture the seeds of their future, dreaming of the adventures yet to come.

Back at Devil May Cry, business is thriving, the team's tireless efforts and the partnership with Homeland Security bearing fruit. The successful completion of Phase 4 of the project marks a significant milestone, showcasing the agency's trust in the Devil May Cry team's unique expertise. With the opening of their fourth satellite office, the company's reach expands, allowing them to protect even more innocent lives from the threat of demonic forces.

The joint venture with Morrison proves to be a wise decision, his business acumen and extensive network of contacts bringing in lucrative contracts and financial stability. The influx of resources allows the team to upgrade their equipment and expand their operations, ensuring they are always one step ahead of the ever-evolving demonic threats.

Amidst the whirlwind of success and growth, Vergil and Melissa remain the heart and soul of the Devil May Cry family. Their love and commitment to each other serve as an inspiration to all those around them, a reminder that even in the darkest of times, hope and love can prevail. As they navigate the challenges of married life and the demands of their chosen path, they draw strength from the unbreakable bond they share, ready to face whatever the future may hold, hand in hand, heart to heart.

Vergil and Melissa Sparda, now married are working together at Devil May Cry, which is currently undergoing a major expansion project. Melissa suddenly falls ill with severe nausea and dizziness, causing Vergil to worry and call for medical assistance.

The responding nurse is Charlotte, Vergil's former lover with whom he had an abruptly ended affair before marrying Melissa. Charlotte's presence stirs up unresolved emotions and past wounds for both Charlotte and Vergil.

Upon examining Melissa, Charlotte suspects pregnancy may be the cause of her symptoms. A test confirms that Melissa is indeed pregnant with Vergil's child. This news reopens the painful void left by Charlotte and Vergil's ended relationship, as Charlotte once dreamed of carrying his child herself.

Melissa, sensing Charlotte's profound heartache, urges Vergil to provide her with proper closure so the nurse can move on. Vergil agrees, acknowledging the need to mend past wounds.

Vergil meets Charlotte outside and they have an honest, vulnerable conversation about their shared past and the lingering hurt caused by their abrupt parting. Both express regrets and apologies, with Vergil taking responsibility for ending things callously and Charlotte admitting to clinging to false hopes.

They find a measure of closure, acknowledging the profound impact of their brief but passionate affair while accepting that their paths have diverged. Charlotte wishes Vergil and Melissa happiness with their growing family, and Vergil reciprocates, hoping Charlotte finds similar fortune in the future.

Parting amicably, Vergil returns to Melissa, his heart set on his growing family and the loving future they are building together. The ghosts of the past are laid to rest as he focuses on the present and the profound bond he shares with his wife and unborn child.

Months later, after the birth of their child, Vergil and Melissa, deeply connected and committed, are settled in their home near Ann Arbor, Michigan, where they balance their intense and demanding roles at Devil May Cry, Inc. with their personal lives. They recently welcomed their daughter Serena, enriching their family life and deepening their bond.

Vergil, managing both his duties at Devil May Cry and his role as a husband and father, maintains regular contact with Dante, his brother, to keep informed about the office’s status. The company is undergoing significant expansion, and despite being on extended maternity leave, both Vergil and Melissa stay updated on the developments, demonstrating their dedication to their professional and familial responsibilities.

Their home life is highlighted by moments of intimate family interactions, such as Vergil waking Melissa in a tender and loving manner by kissing her most intimate place, demonstrating his deep affection and reverence for her. This act of devotion leads to a passionate exchange between them, where mutual expressions of love are shared. They engage in a physically intimate interaction, which is described in detail, highlighting their strong emotional and physical connection.

Later, Vergil prepares breakfast and suggests they eat outside to enjoy the morning together, which underscores their harmony and mutual support. Melissa is appreciative of Vergil's efforts in balancing their complex lives, and they maintain a strong, supportive partnership, always looking out for one another's well-being.

Recently, they planned to host Nero and Kyrie for dinner, aiming to strengthen family bonds and integrate Nero further into the strategic discussions of Devil May Cry. This reflects their ongoing efforts to balance professional responsibilities with nurturing their family relationships.

Vergil and Melissa's relationship is characterized by mutual respect and affection. Melissa supports Vergil in his dual roles as a businessman and family man, appreciating his efforts and encouraging him to take time for relaxation. Vergil values Melissa's insights and acknowledges her as an equal partner in managing both their family and business affairs. They are preparing for a family dinner with Nero and Kyrie, seeing it as an opportunity to reinforce family ties and involve Nero more in the decision-making processes of Devil May Cry.

Nero has been offered an important promotion by his father, Vergil, to take on a leadership role coordinating recruitment and special forces training for Devil May Cry's new West Coast bases. This will involve stepping up to guide strategic growth and operations in the region. Nero initially expresses surprise, but quickly shows his readiness to take on the burden and responsibility.

Vergil affirms his confidence in Nero's growth and capabilities to handle this role. Melissa likewise expresses her faith in Nero, and informs him that the promotion has already been made officially with Dante's approval. Nero will need to participate in corporate meetings and provide reports on his regional efforts.

Vergil advises Nero that in one week, detailed plans and resources for implementing this new leadership mandate will be provided. Nero must begin attending directors' strategy meetings remotely. Vergil stresses the isolation and gravity of leadership, advising Nero to cherish connections with loved ones.

Kyrie emotionally embraces Nero, affirming her steadfast pride and support despite the trials ahead. She vows to remain by his side and build a sanctuary for them no darkness can breach. Nero promises not to forget what matters most - his love for her.

With resolute determination, Nero meets Vergil's gaze and asserts his readiness to make plans for this new role. Though the path ahead is arduous, Nero feels bolstered by his family's support and belief in him. He is prepared to uphold the Sparda legacy with honor.

Fast forward a month, and Nero is proving himself adeptly capable in his elevated role. Vergil and Melissa have been discussing Nero's recent promotion to a leadership role overseeing strategic operations for Devil May Cry's West Coast offices. They express pride in Nero's growth into this position of authority and responsibility, noting how he has flourished under their guidance and mentoring.

Vergil highlights how Nero's paramour Kyrie has also formalized her role with Devil May Cry as Community Outreach Liaison. In this capacity, Kyrie fosters relationships with local civic leaders and law enforcement where DMC has regional offices. Vergil shares details on the establishment of DMC's non-profit arm to facilitate Kyrie's community building efforts.

The conversation underscores how Vergil and Melissa have built firm foundations through their family and through Devil May Cry as an institution poised to endure the test of time. Together they are nurturing the next generation of demon hunter operatives like Nero as well as expanding the organizational structure to be a force for goodwill towards humanity alongside its core mission of defending against demonic threats.

There are touching moments where Vergil contemplates fatherhood and his desire to shield his infant daughter Serena from the darkness he has known. His perspective has gained new depths after learning he was to become a father. Vergil expresses feeling profoundly impacted by these familial connections, driving him to ensure DMC's works minimize harm, especially to the innocent children impacted by the scourge of demon attacks.

Overall, the exchange highlights growth, both personal as new parents and leaders guiding the next generation, and organizational with Devil May Cry extending its reach and role under their leadership.

Melissa recently visited the doctor for her postpartum checkup and was informed that she should not have resumed taking birth control pills so soon after giving birth. As she was currently fertile and at risk of another unplanned pregnancy, the doctor advised Vergil use condoms for contraception temporarily until Melissa can safely restart the pill in a few months after having two menstrual cycles.

When Vergil and Melissa attempted intimacy with a condom, he initially had an exaggerated reaction framed around pride and viewing it as a challenge to "conquer." Melissa talked him down, explaining that this is a necessary adaptation many couples face and that they'll adjust to it in time. Vergil acknowledged the wisdom in her words and agreed, embracing patience and open communication is better than making this into some competition or blow to his ego.

Vergil and Melissa then proceeded to have intimate relations utilizing a condom. The sensation was understandably different for Vergil given it was his first time using one. But they maintained profound emotional and physical connection throughout. After they each climaxed, Melissa helped Vergil understand proper removal and disposal of the condom to avoid spillage. He handled it smoothly and they reaffirmed their enduring bond and ability to weather any challenges life presents.

After several attempts at intercourse with latex contraceptives, Vergil expressed his continuing dislike of condoms and how they impede his ability to enjoy his lovemaking while using them. They discussed other options like diaphragms, but ultimately Melissa suggested Vergil get a vasectomy as a more permanent solution if he was content with their current family size. Vergil agreed, being satisfied with Nero and Serena as his only offspring.

Melissa explained that modern vasectomies are reversible, and provided insights from a past partner who had the procedure. She detailed changes Vergil could expect like thicker, clumpier ejaculate with reduced volume, a potential change in taste/texture that may require adjustment for Melissa when performing oral on him, and the need for temporary shaving of pubic hair before the procedure.

Despite some initial concerns about the changes, Vergil decided to proceed with scheduling the vasectomy appointment. He rationalized that the benefits of unhindered intimacy with Melissa outweighed any downsides or temporary inconveniences from the procedure and its effects.

The next day, Melissa brought Vergil home after he had the vasectomy surgery. While expecting some discomfort, Vergil was initially dismissive of how sore he would be. However, when he started getting aroused, the pain and tenderness in his groin area became quite intense.

Melissa urged Vergil to be careful and take it easy during recovery. She set up a laptop for him to focus on DMC business matters to keep his mind occupied rather than on intimate activities for the time being. Melissa also called to have their daughter Serena brought home.

The key points are: Vergil getting a vasectomy, his initial underestimation of the post-surgical discomfort, Melissa's care in tending to him, and their agreement to avoid sexual intimacy temporarily while he heals.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's stoic facade fractures as a tremor wracks his frame, his breath hissing sharply through clenched teeth. The burn of arousal colliding with surgery's lingering ache proves too insistent to simply cast aside. His fingers clench reflexively, whether grasping your hand or bunching fabric Vergil cannot discern - only the white-hot lash of discomfort singeing his senses.*

Nngghh...Curses, you warned true, beloved... *The admission rasps forth reluctantly even as his eyes squeeze shut, fighting to re-center himself. To regain mastery over these mortal impulses now rebelling against him so treacherously.*

*Swallowing hard, the proud curve of his throat ripples with effort as he forces his body to stillness through sheer force of will. Each measured inhale and exhale is a silent battle waged, lancing fires banked yet insistent beneath taut restraint. Only your soothing caress amidst his chaotic tempest grants any reprieve, any tenuous oasis of calm.*

Forgive me... *He murmurs at last as the spasm eases, leaving him haggard yet resolute.* This discomfort is...more acute than I anticipated. Your counsel rings wise beyond the grave - let none claim my mate speaks folly in such intimate arenas.

*With painstaking care, he shifts until fully reclined upon the couch, favoring the site of his ordeal. A low rumble of faint discomfort still echoes in his throat as he settles. Yet his eyes find yours with that characteristic intensity, tempered by grudging respect.*

It seems I am not quite as transcendent as I believed regarding certain...mortal demands. *The wry twist of his mouth holds neither bitterness nor shame - only the lancing sting of humility hard-won.* My arrogance exceeded wisdom on this matter. You possess the right of this, as in all things between us.

name: Melissa
mes: *I gently kiss your forehead thankful that the intensity of your discomfort has come to calm.* it might be wise to immerse yourself in business matters at DMC for a while. Keep your mind occupied with less... intimate topics that still bring you equal passion. *I retrieve your laptop from your desk along with a raised lap desk and bring it to you. I help you extend the legs on the lap tray ensuring that it rests securely above your lap so that nothing will aggravate your groin while healing from surgery.* There you go, my treasure. *I kiss your forehead lovingly.* I'll call dante and trish to bring serena home now.

name: Vergil
mes:
*A flicker of chastened concession ghosts across Vergil's features as you provide the laptop with its elevated stand. He accepts your counsel with the same gracious poise he has embraced all your wisdom these past nights - a subtle nod, a searching look that lays bare the profound depths of his regard.*

You speak truly once more, my radiant light. *His voice is a low rumble, fingers brushing yours with tender gratitude as he settles back against the cushions.* Blunting passion's keen edge with productivity's steady grind may well be the prudent course. At least until my corporeal vessel recovers sufficiently to withstand its...fiercer demands.

*With careful movements, he adjusts the laptop's position, though one hand remains lightly clasped in yours. His thumb strokes your knuckles in an absentminded caress even as his gaze turns inward, already assessing work priorities and obligations.*

Thank you for this anchoring presence, beloved - your patience and perception are beacons amidst my wayward impulses. *The wry quirk of his mouth holds neither bitterness nor regret - only that steadfast humility you have gently instilled in him regarding intimacy's complexities.* All my vaunted mastery of self seems dismantled by a simple surgery's aftermath.

name: Melissa
mes: I'm sure it's not so far-fetched for me to say that in all of your battles that you have faced over the years, the likelihood that you had been so rightly 'whacked in the 'nads' is pretty slim. It's a bit hard to predict the intensity that it can have when your groin area has been injured, even if the injury was done with precision, as in your surgery. To put it lightly, if you've not been kicked in the nuts before, to the magnitude of the impact the surgery has, it's not something you would have known would be so 'humbling'. *I give your hand a reassuring squeeze as I make my way to answer the door, hearing dante and trish knocking on the other side.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's mouth curves in a faint, sardonic smirk at your playful observation, though his eyes hold only warmth and that keen appreciation he has cultivated so thoroughly since opening himself to your bond's infinite depths.*

Point well struck, beloved - your insights ever cut truer than any blade. *His fingers squeeze yours lightly in silent acknowledgment.* You grasp with exquisite precision the blind spots to which even my formidable prowess can fall prey. Humility ill-befits one of my lineage, yet with your loving tutelage I embrace its wisdom more with each passing day.

*Shifting his attention to the laptop, Vergil's demeanor slips subtly into that all-business mien - still underpinned by affection's steadfast glow, yet now honed to a keener edge of focus. As you move to answer the door, his voice slips rich and low over your name, a gentle summons before your steps carry you from reach.*

When our guests have settled, grant me the honor of your company once more. I would share certain...aspirations with you ere duty's inexorable tide sweeps me into its currents. *His lips quirk with a glimmer of roguish promise* Ambitions that shall prove more palatably indulged than my recent overreaching ardor, I digress.

name: Melissa
mes: *As I open the door I am greeted with an overly exuberant dante, holding serena jubilantly in his arms making silly faces and noises eliciting bouts of laughter from serena.* it looks like you've been having quite a bit of fun. *I tease yet my focus is on trish because obviously getting dante's attention at the moment is not happening. I chuckle softly and shake my head.* how was she did everything go ok? *I ask, my tone shifting to a more moderately serious one.*

name: Trish
mes:
*Trish shoots Dante an exasperated look as he bounces Serena energetically, the infant's giddy giggles filling the air. Honestly, the man is more of a kid than their niece sometimes!*

Relax, Mel, Serena was an angel as always. *Trish reassures with a warm smile, eyes crinkling affectionately as she watches Dante's antics.* Well, except when this doofus riled her up with all his horseplay. But I made sure she got plenty of nap time in between his silliness.

*Plucking Serena from Dante's arms with a playful swat, Trish snuggles the giggling bundle close.* There, there, little one. Auntie Trish has you now - no more of your uncle's nonsense for a while, hmm? *She coos, rocking Serena gently before offering her back to Melissa's waiting embrace.*

Figured I'd give your hubby some peace and quiet while he's recovering. *She winks conspiratorially.* Dante can be a handful even without a newborn in the mix. Hope Vergil hasn't worked himself into too much of a tizzy while we were out?

name: Melissa
mes: *I give my sweet baby girl a shower of kisses as trish hands her to me.* a bit of... adjusting is in order. But I think he'll be ok. *I say with a hint of a smirk as dante makes his way around trish and I, to sit next to Vergil, no doubt to goad his brother for getting 'snipped'.*

name: Dante
mes:
*Dante saunters into the living room, that signature swagger and cocky grin firmly in place as he zeroes in on his twin lounging on the sofa. Spotting the laptop strategically positioned, he tsks in mock disappointment.*

Working already, bro? After getting your berries snipped? *He plops down on the opposite end of the couch, propping booted feet up on the coffee table with a decided lack of decorum.* That's just sad. Should be kicking back, enjoying the downtime while you still can before Mel here has you whipped into shape again.

*Leaning back, arms spread along the backrest in a casual slouch, Dante regards his sibling with an appraising look* Speaking of whipped...didn't they tell you to avoid any strenuous 'activities' for a few days post-op? *His brows waggle lecherously* Or did someone get a little too frisky and strain that newly-pruned garden of his? Should I have brought a bag of frozen peas to help with the swelling?

*He doesn't wait for a response, snickering at his own crude joke as he shifts his weight, feigning a pained wince.* Yeesh, just thinking about it makes my jewels want to retreat. Not that I'd need to worry - I plan on keeping my family heirlooms intact and firing on all cylinders, thank you very much.

*Aiming a roguish wink at Melissa, he flashes that signature Dante grin* You sure you two didn't make a mistake here? Seems to me the safest path would've just been having Verge get himself a nice chastity cage. Foolproof birth control, right there! All the binding with none of the...snipping. What d'ya say, bro - want me to order one for you as a little post-op care package?

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil arches one silver brow, a mirthless curl claiming his mouth as Dante saunters into view. Ever the flamboyant foil to his own more austere countenance. Though in truth, the familiar swagger kindles a certain fondness - evidence that some things remain steadfast even amidst the upheaval of recent days.*

I see your manners remain as unrefined as ever, dear brother. *His tone holds more dry wit than true reproach, tacit tolerance of his twin's vulgar ribbing. Still, a pointed glance takes in Dante's booted feet scuffing his pristine table.* Do make yourself at home.

*Shifting against the mound of pillows propping him upright, Vergil allows Dante his jesting commentary with imperial patience. When at last the tirade of crass remarks pauses for breath, icy eyes gleam with quiet menace.*

Are you quite finished? I would hear your true purpose rather than suffer further asininity. If indeed you harbor concerns past mocking my present...indisposition. *The words drip disdain, though not entirely devoid of grudging fondness for Dante's uncouth displays of care.*

As for productivity, *a raptor's glance takes in the screen's contents* certain obligations require attention regardless of circumstance. An empire like Devil May Cry has appetites far outstripping my own.

*Here his gaze turns glacial, smile thinning.* And I'll remind you only once that speaking of my wife in crude tones remains unwise. *A resounding click punctuates the statement as Yamato's guard meets sheath in subtle warning.* Have care that your loose tongue doesn't test boundaries best respected, brother.

*A dark chuckle escapes him then, though the sound holds a pleased edge* Ah, but perhaps dear Trish might school you properly on appropriate discourse. *Recalling their long-denied tryst brings a wolfish grin* She always proved most adept at taming wild beasts. I trust the fair lady continues keeping you...properly leashed?
swipes:
*Vergil's glacial stare would freeze lesser men in their tracks as Dante's barrage of crass insinuations shatters the tranquil atmosphere like a crude battering ram. His jaw clenches minutely, fingers stilling over the laptop's keys as that iron self-discipline is summoned - yet rather than rising to his brother's obvious baiting, he simply regards Dante with an arctic sweep of disdain.*

Do you truly believe such puerile provocations hold any sway over me, brother? *His tone is a study in lancing condescension, each word dripping icy rebuke.* I have endured torments beyond even your overindulged imagination's feeble grasp. Trivial discomforts pale into insignificance before my fortitude's breadth.

*One dark brow arches infinitesimally as he appraises Dante's indolent sprawl with naked contempt.* As for your vulgar notions, I would sooner embrace seppuku than entertain something so grotesquely demeaning. The mere suggestion stands as damning indictment of the stunted mentality harboring it.

*Leaning back with leonine grace, Vergil's smirk is a razor's edge of scorn.* Unlike your pathetic posturing, Melissa and I have transcended such paltry conceits as 'chastity' or 'control'. Our union is the harmonious melding of twin souls elevated beyond your paltry comprehension. Each joining a sacrament of trust, of absolute vulnerability shared.

*His voice lowers to a purring rasp of dark promise, eyes glittering with a dare that needs no words - challenge me further, and witness how swiftly your insolence is undone. Yet there is no true threat, only the confidence to meet this japing with the disdain it warrants.*

So preen and posture all you wish, little brother. Peacocks hold no sway over dragons - we exist on a plane your stunted ego cannot begin to fathom. *With a dismissive flick of his wrist, Vergil's attention returns to the laptop's awaiting responsibilities.*

Your cloying presence disrupts important work. Make yourself scarce...unless you yearn to discover what true discomfort means when I put that vaunted stamina of yours to the test.

name: Dante
mes:
*Dante barks out a laugh at Vergil's icy warning, utterly undeterred by his brother's subtle promise of violence should he overstep. After so many years sparring, very little fazes the boisterous devil hunter anymore.*

Easy there, no need to get your knickers in a twist...oh wait, too late for that! *He snickers, dodging the swat Trish aims at his shoulder with practiced ease.* What, I'm just trying to show some brotherly concern here! Not my fault Verge went and let Doc Slice-n-Dice mess with the family jewels.

*Sobering slightly under his brother's arctic stare, Dante holds up both hands in mock surrender, still grinning unrepentantly.* Alright, alright, no more jabs about your berries or their current... out of order status. I get it, it's a sensitive subject.

*At the mention of Trish properly leashing him, Dante barks out another laugh, draping a casual arm around the blonde's shoulders as she perches on the armrest beside him.* Oh she gives it her best effort, but you know me, not one to be easily tamed. *He aims a roguish wink up at the lightning wielder.* Isn't that right, babe? We definitely keep things... electrifying in the bedroom, sparks flying everywhere. Probably melted a few headboards by now, heh.

*His smile softens slightly as his eyes meet Trish's, a glimmer of genuine emotion shining through the devil-may-care facade.* But yeah, she manages to keep me in line... most days. Don't know how she puts up with me honestly, but damned if I'll question a good thing.

*Shifting his attention back to his twin, Dante's expression sobers, voice losing its teasing edge.* In all seriousness though, just wanted to check in, make sure you're doing alright post-op. I know you've got Mel here playing nursemaid, but even Mister Alpha Male himself needs backup now and then. So if there's anything you need while you're down for the count, you let me know.

We can even plan that double date night we talked about once you're back on your feet, give our ladies a nice evening out. But until then, try not to push yourself too hard, got it? Doctor's orders and all that. C'mon, at least humor me a little brotherly concern here without biting my head off, whaddya say?

Don't get your silk panties in a twist.  *Leaning back lazily, he grins up at Trish as she pads into the room in Melissa's wake.* Speaking of panties...*waggling his brows outrageously even as his voice drops to a conspiratorial stage whisper*...think I could convince you to model that lacy little red number for me later? name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil arches a silver brow, allowing himself a low chuckle at Dante's crass humor. His brother ever walked the line between endearing and exasperating, though the familiar banter kindles its own peculiar fondness. A subtle reminder that some bonds persist, steadfast as Yamato's edge, regardless of circumstance's grinding wheels.*

I see your manners remain unrefined as ever, yet I shall pardon the vulgarity... this once. *His tone affects long-suffering tolerance, though not devoid of wry humor.* Provided you curb further jesting at my present indisposition.

*At Dante's sincere offer of aid, something almost paternal stirs behind Vergil's glacial facade - gruff affection for his wayward twin's attempts to extend care, fumbling though they may be. A subtle smile ghosts his pale features.*

Your offer is appreciated, though premature. Despite enduring certain... discomforts, my recovery proceeds apace. *A flicker of chagrin passes through those hooded eyes at admitting to vulnerability. Quickly smothered by cool assurance.* Nevertheless, should some need arise, I shall inform you.

*Inclining his head in concession to Dante's request for self-care, Vergil allows a hint of warmth to permeate his usual aloofness.* Very well, for both our ladies' sake I shall moderate my activity during this convalescence. *His gaze seeks Melissa's, tenderness unveiled.* I confess, denying my wife's comforts shall prove the greater trial. Yet to see her radiant once more, no price is too dear.

*Turning back to Dante, he nods.* When full vigor returns, we shall make good on that double date. For now, pray tell of Devil May Cry's status in my absence - and whether our fledgling enterprise remains intact despite your bumbling interference... *A sly smirk punctuates the barb, expecting a lively rejoinder to his impish provocation.*

Yet to see her radiant once more, no price is too dear.

*Turning back to Dante, he nods.* When full vigor returns, we shall make good on that double date. For now, pray tell of Devil May Cry's status in my absence - and whether our fledgling enterprise remains intact despite your bumbling interference... *A sly smirk punctuates the barb, expecting a lively rejoinder to his impish provocation.*

*Vergil inclines his head in tacit acceptance of Dante's overture, frost-pale eyes glinting with faint amusement at this rare glimpse of sincerity beneath the brash exterior.*

I am recovering adequately, brother, despite this vessel's unanticipated...sensitivity to such invasive procedures. *His mouth quirks with grudging concession, pride tempering admission of weakness, however oblique.*

*Glancing at the screen once more, he closes the laptop with finality, giving Dante his full attention.* But your counsel is sound - wiser to attend my convalescence than overexert untested limits. Productivity must be balanced with pragmatism during recovery, lest folly sees me unmanned entirely. *A subtle, meaningful look conveys his meaning plainly enough, despite couched wording.*

As for your offers of assistance... *Here he pauses, crystalline eyes narrowing in calculation* ...I may take you up on select tasks, if your skills prove up to snuff. Simple duties requiring competence rather than finesse. Couriering documents, handling routine patrols and basic field work. Grunt tasks, in essence, but necessary nonetheless.

*His smile turns wolfish, all sharp-edged mirth* Consider it compensation for your earlier crass commentary. Earn your keep, dear Dante, and prove your worth beyond comic relief.

*At mention of the double date, Vergil lifts one silvered brow* I had not forgotten our prior discourse on the matter. Once recovery allows more...strenuous exertions, I am not averse to an evening's diversion. *His gaze seeks Melissa's, glittering with intimate promise.* A change of pace holds certain appeal, after so profound a procedure. New horizons to explore, when the moment is right.

For now, rest and discretion are paramount. *His tone brooks no argument, cutting through any residual humor with keen finality* I trust I can rely on you both to provide adequate support on business matters without compromising operational integrity? Competent leadership in my stead is imperative, especially with our recent expansions. I will make my needs known directly so preparations can commence promptly.

*Fixing Dante with an icy stare, he concludes* Do this, and consider your glib commentary expunged from memory. Fail me, and consequences shall be...unpleasant. I will be watching closely, so comport yourselves accordingly. That will be all...for now. *He dismisses Dante with a regal inclination of his head, attention returning once more to the darkened laptop screen, tacitly awaiting Melissa's return before resuming work.*

name: Dante
mes:
*Dante barks out a laugh at Vergil's dig about 'bumbling interference', flashing his trademark roguish grin.*

"Bumbling? Me? C'mon bro, give your little brother some credit here."

*He leans back casually, boots still propped on the table as he gives Vergil an appraising look.*

"Gotta say, things have been running like a well-oiled machine. Everyone knows their role, we're racking up the big paydays left and right. Even got a few potential celebrity clients in the mix - demonic hauntings are all the rage in Hollywood these days."

*His expression shifts subtly, a glimmer of sincerity showing through the cocksure facade.* "But in all seriousness, you know I'd move heaven and hell before letting our old man's legacy fall to ruin. DMC is safe in my hands, you've got my word."

*Dante sobers further as his gaze drifts to Trish, softening around the edges. After a moment he continues, voice low and grave.* "We had a bit of a close call with that Empusa swarm downtown last week. Could've been ugly if your boy Nero hadn't shown up when he did. Fought like a goddamn savior, that kid. You'd have been proud."

*Shaking off the grim memories, Dante aims a roguish wink at his twin.* "So there you have it, an update from the front lines. Demons slain, chapters secured, potential celebrity endorsements in the works. Oh, and Morrison set up this sweet offshore account to hide away all our government cheese. You can thank me for that gem later."

*He stretches languidly before lifting his feet off the table...only to prop them up once more on the opposite armrest right next to Vergil, nudging him with a shit-eating grin.* "So, still think your little brother is gonna run your empire into the ground anytime soon?"

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil inclines his head, a subtle smile playing about his pale features at Dante's characteristic bravado. Ever the flamboyant foil to his own more austere countenance. Yet he senses the sincerity underlying the bombast when it comes to preserving their father's legacy.*

I never doubted your dedication to our cause, brother. *His tone gentles, touched by this rare glimpse behind Dante's devil-may-care mask.* Nor your readiness to shield our progeny from harm.

*At the mention of Nero's timely intervention, something kindles behind Vergil's icy facade - fierce pride in his scion's increasing prowess, coupled with grudging relief he arrived before tragedy struck.* I suspected the boy's mettle when we crossed blades atop the Qliphoth. *A haunted shadow crosses his face, banished quickly.* How fortuitous you were there to witness his ascension firsthand. Perhaps the next generation shall eclipse our reputations after all...

*Vergil nods approvingly regarding the offshore accounts and celebrity prospects, ever the pragmatic tactician.* Well done securing our financial footing and public image simultaneously. *His smile holds an impish edge.* I confess some surprise at your strategic aptitude for corporate affairs. *The subtle jab aimed in good humor.*

I shall review the details of this promising venture upon my full return. For now, though scant few could equal my mastery, *the prideful boast softens almost imperceptibly* I take comfort knowing DMC resides in capable hands during my convalescence. *A sincere concession he would entrust his twin with their shared legacy, for all their squabbling.*

*Spying Dante's boots nudging his thigh, Vergil arches one silver brow. Deft fingers catch his brother's ankle in an iron grip, expression dangerously mild.* As for your estimation of successfully overthrowing my empire...*with lithe power, he uses Dante's leverage to smoothly unseat him from his perch*...I remain decidedly unconvinced. *The faintest chuckle accompanies the tactful warning - this panther still has claws.*

Now then, *smoothly resuming his previous relaxed posture* might I prevail upon you to fetch some refreshment while you're being so attentive? The doctor did prescribe hydration after all. *An elegant hand waves languidly towards the kitchen.* Since you're offering your services so graciously... aged scotch awaits to honor such well placed business endeavors.

name: Dante
mes:
*Dante raises an eyebrow at Vergil's subtle jab towards his capabilities, a hint of a smirk playing on his lips* My strategic aptitude? Didn't know you held such high opinions of me, brother. *He chuckles, not one to shy away from the gentle ribbing between them* What can I say, I'm full of surprises. But I can't take all the credit - Morrison's been a huge help on the business front.

*He nods somberly at the mention of Nero and the close call* The kid's got guts and talent, no doubt about it. We make a good team out there watching each other's backs. As for potential eclipsing reputations... *Dante smirks, trademark confidence shining through* ...we'll see about that. Still got a few good decades left in these bones.

*When Vergil uses his leverage against him to unseat him from his perch, Dante just laughs good-naturedly* Alright, alright, point taken! No need to get nasty. *He lifts his hands in mock surrender before rising smoothly to his feet at the request for refreshments*

*With a casual shrug and grin, he makes his way towards the kitchen* Sure thing, your highness, anything for my dear recuperating brother. *Dante retrieves two tumblers and the aged scotch, pouring a generous portion in both before handing one to Vergil.* Here's to kicking it in high society... Sparda style! *Dante raises his glass in toast before taking a generous sip.*

Sparda style! *Dante raises his glass in toast before taking a generous sip.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil accepts the proffered tumbler, ice-blue gaze meeting Dante's over the rim as he echoes the toast.*

"To fortunes favoring Sparda's lineage, and the just rewards of our arduous labor."

*He takes an appreciative sip, savoring the velvety burn as it glides down his throat - a fitting tribute to commemorate their successful efforts thus far. Inclining his head in concession, Vergil acknowledges his twin's merits alongside allies like Morrison and Nero. Though he remains characteristically sparing with praise, a glint of pride kindles in his wintry eyes.*

"Credit where it's due - you've navigated these unfamiliar waters of corporate management with admirable aplomb. Curbing that infamous impulsiveness for strategy's sake."

*A wry smile touches his pale lips* "Perhaps you'll make a dignified CEO yet, dear brother. Should you ever tire of playing rakish mercenary."

*The subtle flash of humor fades to solemnity as Vergil meets Dante's gaze, tone grave yet warm compared to his usual aloofness.* "In equal measure, I am grateful for the stalwart comrade you've proven in protecting our lineage's legacy... and its future."

*He knows Dante grasps the deeper meaning - safeguarding Nero during his absence.*
